title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2394.12 - Stay of sale
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2394.12 - Stay of sale

State Regulations

The personal or real property of any person to whom the
provisions of this Part are applicable shall not be sold until the expiration
of time for the filing of a petition to which the provisions of Part 3000 of
this Title are applicable unless that person consents to such sale, or the

State Tax Commission determines that the expenses of conservation and
maintenance will greatly reduce the net proceeds or if the property is
perishable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2394.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
